name: Air France-KLM
goal:
Air France-KLM is a world leader in air transport.

A global group with a strong European base, Air France-KLM’s main areas of business are passenger transport, cargo transport and aeronautical maintenance.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Air Traffic Management efficiency
Airport charges
Taxes
Environment
Consumer protection
Fair competition
Social issues
Brexit
